Title: Mahouka x Mameshiba
Description: ['A collaboration between ', Mameshiba, ' and ', Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei, " meant to promote the latter's film release in July 2017. In the first short, Tatsuya is replaced by a Mameshiba Edamame version of his character recreating scenes from the TV anime. A new collaboration product line is being released as well with assorted Mameshiba-ified character goods of Mahouka characters."]
